001
002package com.commercetools.docs.meta;
003
004/**
005 * {@include.toc}
006 * The exception hierarchy documentation.
007 *
008 * <h2>Exceptions</h2>
009 *
010 * The SDK makes use of exceptions from the Java JDK, such as {@link java.lang.IllegalArgumentException}, and provides own exceptions which all inherit from {@link io.vrap.rmf.base.client.error.BaseException}.
011 *
012 * <p>Problems concerning the {@link io.vrap.rmf.base.client.ApiHttpClient} throw a {@link io.vrap.rmf.base.client.ApiHttpException}.</p>
013 *
014 * <p>JSON serializing and deserializing problems throw {@link io.vrap.rmf.base.client.utils.json.JsonException}.</p>
015 *
016 * <p>{@link io.vrap.rmf.base.client.ApiHttpException} is a base exception for all error responses from Composable Commerce (HTTP status code {@code >= 400}).</p>
017 *
018 * <p>{@link io.vrap.rmf.base.client.error.ApiClientException} expresses errors which can be recovered by the client side (HTTP status code {@code >= 400 and < 500}).
019 * {@link io.vrap.rmf.base.client.error.ApiServerException} is for server errors.</p>
020 *
021 * <img src="{@docRoot}/io/vrap/rmf/base/client/error/exceptionhierarchy.svg" alt="Exception hierarchy" width="95%">
022 *
023 * <h3>Errors</h3>
024 *
025 * If a command cannot be performed due to unfulfilled preconditions
026 * the API can return one error response with multiple errors (<a href="https://docs.commercetools.com/api/errors">listing of error codes</a>).
027 * The SDK will then put a {@link io.vrap.rmf.base.client.error.BadRequestException} into a {@link java.util.concurrent.CompletionStage}.
028 *
029 * <h3>Custom HttpExceptionFactory</h3>
030 *
031 * <p>In case a response with a status code of 400 or higher are treated as errors and raise exceptions. These exceptions
032 * are created by the {@link io.vrap.rmf.base.client.error.DefaultHttpExceptionFactory}. In case you want to override the handling you have to implement
033 * this interface and override the default methods if necessary.</p>
034 *
035 * {@include.example example.HttpExceptionFactoryTest}
036 */
037public class ExceptionDocumentation {
038}
